content: lion brand pattern # 40493-2-c *cwetq-mansponcho pdf* skill level easy wool-ease® thick & quick® article #640 a 5 balls b 4 balls c 4 balls *shown in pine goldenrod wood* crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm worked in single_crochet and double_crochet number of row worked in each color varies this poncho is made of 2 rectangles worked sideways so the stripes run horizontally on the body the rectangles are sewn together at the shoulders of the garment garment can also be worn so stripes are vertical see also man s striped poncho knit 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mans-striped-poncho-knit
